title: Lady Liberty

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- At night, choose a player to Scorch.
- Scorched players will be dealt a powerful attack during the day tomorrow if they voted for an innocent player who was hung that day, or did not vote for a guilty player who was hung that day.
- All players will see this happen. They don't see who did it though.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - You can only speak in all-caps during the day and must refer to "Justice" at least once per day. If you fail, you're blackmailed the next day.

desc:
Post 3900
*I just remembered the time I joined a discord fighting game and rp or something and I chose to be the statue of liberty. That was a pretty dumb bit*
